name: Space Waves (Chrysp)
description:
A submission for GMTK Game Jam 2019.

On a mission to defend earth, you are dispatched to the front lines against the waves of aliens that threaten humanity. 

Hit by space debris, the space ship breaks its black hole drive and time starts and stops around you!

Never giving up, you try to use this twisted passage of time to your combat advantage.

A game made with friends over the weekend.

Thanks to Omniburucchus, InstarEmergence, and FallenAngelYohane for the help and guidance. Can't make this without you guys.

Special thanks to BBosch for compiling the game for us. Game Maker: Studio was weird this time.
